relatedBlades.title: Reducing the cost of consolidation
relatedBlades.copy: Many 'platforms' have underdelivered on lowering TCO — here are 4 qualities that CISOs can use to evaluate platforms for consolidation and gain real cost benefits.

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Security Innovation - Reducing the cost of consolidation - Image

features.title: Redefining cyber security with Zero Trust
features.description: The scope of cyber security has extended far beyond fundamental protection — Gartner predicts that by 2025, 60% of companies will use Zero Trust to help navigate IT complexity

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Redefining cyber security with Zero Trust - Image

features.title: Securing the sales organization
features.description: Empowering Sales is critical to most businesses because it drives revenue — A challenge if we rely on VPNs and other legacy security tools. Fortunately, there is a way to balance the needs of Sales and Security

features.title: Pursuing privacy-first security
features.description: Data privacy has been elevated as a matter of importance to mitigating risk — now more than ever, CISOs must collaborate with their CPOs to implement a privacy-first security program

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Pursuing privacy-first security - Image

features.title: Any-to-any connectivity for business
features.description: Connecting the corporate network has become a challenge for organizations dealing with vendor sprawl. A connectivity cloud eliminates networking complexity and addresses diverse networking needs

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Security Innovation -Any-to-any connectivity for business - Image

features.title: Securing the healthcare ecosystem
features.description: Over 100 million people were affected by cyber attacks in the healthcare industry last year — 5 strategies that keep healthcare cyber resilient

features.title: The business case for Zero Trust
features.description: Zero Trust enables continuous monitoring and validation for a workforce that is often the first and last line of defense when dealing with cyber threats

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - The business case for Zero Trust - Image

features.title: Staying ahead of scammers
features.description: The "human element" is still a factor in 3 out of every 4 breaches. Daragh Mahon, CIO of Werner Enterprises discusses how to balance training, penetration testing, and solutions to stay ahead

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Staying ahead of scammers - Image

features.title: Elevating organizational trust with Zero Trust
features.description: Security is at the heart of consumer trust — In an era where data breaches and cyber attacks are both pervasive and prevalent, organizations need a proactive and comprehensive security strategy

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Elevating organizational trust with Zero Trust - Image

features.title: Security without stagnation
features.description: I make room for mentoring because I believe it serves a greater good and helps drive continuous innovation in cyber security. Here are 3 questions CSO's should ask before embarking on a mentorship relationship

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Security without stagnation: What I've learned from mentoring startups - Image

features.title: Regain control of IT with the connectivity cloud
features.description: Security has gone from being responsible for one technological domain — the on-prem environment — to many others, causing a loss in visibility and control

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Regain control of IT with the connectivity cloud - Image

features.title: Regain control of complex network environments
features.description: Vendor consolidation does not mean giving up flexibility or scalability. You can implement a connected, composable platform that has flexibility for change and the scalability to expand as your networks expand

features.title: Unlocking cyber resilience through culture
features.description: Building cyber resilience into company culture requires a shift in both mindset and behavior. Here are 8 ways that leadership can reinforce cyber security as a culture.
